returnValues.name: cancel
returnValues.description: Aborts any ongoing summarization or creation task.

returnValues.name: checkAvailability
returnValues.description: Checks if the AI model is 'available', 'unavailable', or 'downloadable'.

returnValues.name: create
returnValues.description: Instantiates the Summarizer model with specific options (type, length, format).

returnValues.name: destroy
returnValues.description: Cleans up the model instance and releases browser resources.

returnValues.name: isSupported
returnValues.description: true if the browser supports the window.Summarizer API.

returnValues.name: summarize
returnValues.description: Asynchronously processes the input text and returns a summary.
